Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: GenAI has had no substantial impact on my learning because generally speaking I think the advice it provides is usually questionable in terms of accuracy.

Question 41.Response: Of course any advice given by a teacher is going to be far more illuminating and helpful because the attention of another individual is being put on your work
